name: My Love Lines
description:
My Love Lines is a super addictive, simple, yet challenging puzzle game. Remove pieces from the board by lining up five hearts of the same colour in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction. Testing wits and reflexes, more hearts are added after every move, forcing you to think ahead to stop the board from filling up. Use special power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous love themed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

+ Love theme with lots of cute visuals.
+ Two game modes; Classic and Arcade
+ Timed pieces which 'lock' into the board after a number of moves.
+ Two methods for moving the pieces on the board; Tap-Tap and Drag-And-Drop.
+ Undo bad moves, you can even go right back to the start of the game!
+ Angelic power ups to help you along.
+ Easy to learn, yet hard to master. .
+ Easy mode in the early levels to help new players get used to the game play.

CLASSIC MODE
The classical Lines game without any power ups or special pieces and using the original rule set.

ARCADE MODE
A quick action game with power ups and special pieces to play with.
